{"settings":"{
    "todo-tree.tree.showScanModeButton": false,
    "workbench.editorAssociations": {
        "*.ipynb": "jupyter-notebook",
        "*.nupkg": "n",
        "*.jpg"  : "imagePreview.previewEditor"
    },
    "python.defaultInterpreterPath": "C:\\Python310\\python.exe",
    "editor.suggestSelection": "recentlyUsedByPrefix",
    "vsintellicode.modify.editor.suggestSelection": "enabled",
    "explorer.confirmDragAndDrop": false,
    "editor.renderControlCharacters": true,
    "cSpell.language": "en,lorem,en-GB,en-US",
    "security.workspace.trust.untrustedFiles": "open",
    "code-runner.defaultLanguage": "php",
    "code-runner.cwd": "code-runner.fileDirectoryAsCwd",
    "json.maxItemsComputed": 200000,
    "sqltools.formatLanguages": [
        "sql",
        "mySQL"
    ],
    "editor.formatOnPaste": true,
    "editor.formatOnSave": true,
    "editor.formatOnType": true,
    "cSpell.enableFiletypes": [
        "asciidoc",
			"c",
			"cpp",
			"csharp",
			"css",
			"elixir",
			"erlang",
			"git-commit",
			"go",
			"graphql",
			"handlebars",
			"haskell",
			"html",
			"jade",
			"java",
			"javascript",
			"javascriptreact",
			"json",
			"jsonc",
			"jupyter",
			"latex",
			"less",
			"markdown",
			"php",
			"plaintext",
			"python",
			"pug",
			"restructuredtext",
			"rust",
			"scala",
			"scss",
			"scminput",
			"swift",
			"text",
			"typescript",
			"typescriptreact",
			"vue",
			"yaml",
			"yml",
			"COBOL",
			"ACUCOBOL"
    ],
    "sass.format.debug": true,
    "[json]": {
        "editor.defaultFormatter": "esbenp.prettier-vscode"
    },
    "remote.downloadExtensionsLocally": true,
    "[xml]": {
        "editor.defaultFormatter": "svipas.prettier-plus"
    },
    "editor.accessibilitySupport": "off",
    "cSpell.userWords": [
        "Norditerm",
        "widgety"
    ],
    "workbench.colorTheme": "Dracula Refined",
    "explorer.confirmDelete": false,
    "terminal.integrated.gpuAcceleration": "on",
    "terminal.integrated.persistentSessionScrollback": 1000,
    "terminal.integrated.scrollback": 10000,
    "terminal.integrated.shellIntegration.history": 1000,
    "terminal.integrated.cursorBlinking": true,
    "terminal.integrated.enableBell": true,
    "terminal.integrated.fontFamily": "SauceCodePro NFM",
    "terminal.integrated.fontSize": 13,
    "[python]": {
        "editor.formatOnType": true
    },
    "bookmarks.label.suggestion": "suggestWhenSelectedOrLineWhenNoSelected",
    "powershell.codeFormatting.trimWhitespaceAroundPipe": true,
    "powershell.codeFormatting.useConstantStrings": true,
    "powershell.codeFormatting.useCorrectCasing": true,
    "powershell.codeFormatting.whitespaceBetweenParameters": true,
    "terminal.integrated.profiles.windows": {
        "PowerShell": {
            "source": "PowerShell",
            "icon": "terminal-powershell"
        },
        "Command Prompt": {
            "path": [
                "${env:windir}\\Sysnative\\cmd.exe",
                "${env:windir}\\System32\\cmd.exe"
            ],
            "args": [],
            "icon": "terminal-cmd"
        },
        "Git Bash": {
            "source": "Git Bash"
        },
        "PowerShell-edit": {
            "path": "C:\\Program Files\\PowerShell\\7\\pwsh.exe"
        }
    },
    "terminal.integrated.cursorWidth": 3,
    "terminal.integrated.defaultProfile.linux": "",
    "editor.minimap.enabled": false,
    "workbench.iconTheme": "material-icon-theme",
    "files.autoSave": "afterDelay",
    "editor.bracketPairColorization.independentColorPoolPerBracketType": true,
    "editor.foldingImportsByDefault": true,
    "editor.colorDecoratorsLimit": 5000,
    "[css]": {
        "editor.defaultFormatter": "svipas.prettier-plus"
    },
    "livePreview.showServerStatusNotifications": true,
    "livePreview.tasks.runTaskWithExternalPreview": true,
    "livePreview.debugOnExternalPreview": true,
    "livePreview.openPreviewTarget": "External Browser",
    "search.showLineNumbers": true,
    "search.mode": "reuseEditor",
    "search.defaultViewMode": "tree",
    "[html]": {
        "editor.defaultFormatter": "svipas.prettier-plus"
    },
    "[javascript]": {
        "editor.defaultFormatter": "svipas.prettier-plus"
    },
    "[scss]": {
        "editor.defaultFormatter"       : "syler.sass-indented",
        "editor.autoIndent"             : "advanced",
        "editor.acceptSuggestionOnEnter": "smart",
        "editor.autoClosingBrackets"    : "beforeWhitespace",
        "editor.autoClosingQuotes" :    "always",
        
    },
    "super-figure.vectorFigureEditor": "C:/Program Files/Inkscape/bin/inkscape.exe",
    "super-figure.bitmapFigureEditor": "C:/Program Files/GIMP 2/bin/gimp-2.10.exe",
    "cSpell.customDictionaries"      : {
        "custom-dictionary-user": {
            "name": "custom-dictionary-user",
            "path": "~/.cspell/custom-dictionary-user.txt",
            "addWords": true,
            "scope": "user"
        }
    },
    "markdown-image.local.referencePath": "/images",
    "markdown.copyFiles.destination": {
        "${documentDirName}": "Readme"
    },
    "workbench.sideBar.location": "right",
    "workbench.tips.enabled": false,
    "workbench.view.alwaysShowHeaderActions": true,
    "workbench.commandPalette.experimental.suggestCommands": true,
    "swissknife": {
        "swissknife.notesEnabled"              : true,
        "workbench.settings.applyToAllProfiles": [
        
            "swissknife.notesEnabled"
        ]
    },
    
    
    "workbench.activityBar.location"             : "top",
    "betterAlign.alignAfterTypeEnter"            : true,
    "vsintellicode.features.python.deepLearning" : "enabled",
    "vsintellicode.modelDownloadPath"            : "C:/backup/Visual studio code/Intellicode",
    "vsintellicode.sql.completionsEnabled"       : true,
    "vsintellicode.java.completionsEnabled"      : true,
    "vsintellicode.typescript.completionsEnabled": true,
    "vsintellicode.python.completionsEnabled": true,
    "workspaceExplorer.workspaceStorageDirectory": "C:\\backup\\Visual studio code\\Workspaces",
    "workbench.settings.applyToAllProfiles": [
        "workspaceExplorer.workspaceStorageDirectory"
    ],
    "folder-indexing.exclude": [
        "*\\bin\\*",
        "*\\obj\\*",
        "*\\.svn\\*",
        "*\\.git\\*",
        "*\\.gitignore\\*",
        "*\\.dwg\\*",
        "*\\.ai\\*",
        "*\\.CR2\\*",

        "*.dll",
        "*.exe"
    ],
    "folder-indexing.searchResultMaxSize": 100000,
    "artisan.location"        : "",
    "virustotal.database_path": "c:\\backup\\Visual studio code\\extensions\\VirusTotal\\cacheDatabase",
    "virustotal.shared_folder": "C:\\backup\\Visual studio code\\extensions\\VirusTotal\\VscodeVirusTotal-SharedFolder",
    "virustotal.api_key"      : "8c58a182b115fb56cbb893b259a6987cede9f9550c2fa4250a3903946f7085e3",

}"}
